body:
I did some very basic stuff in Blender before, in the older version - before 2.80, mostly just tutorials, in Blender 2.80 there was a lot of changes like UI overhaul, and I also forget almost every shortcut 😅 (shortcuts are heavily used in Blender and very unique, e.g. `G` to move things). Didn't touch Blender for over a year and half, then a month ago I came back, started slowly relearning what I forgot, did the Ruqqie, learned about compositor (thing for mostly effects like the shining crown), and in this project I learned a few new things (e.g. render layers for correcting colors of Ruqqie and environment independently, and ambient occlusion which looks great here, since there are no textures except a background image, it adds nice "shadow" gradients, visible for example on a bottom of trunks or top of bricks).

I think a pro could have done this project in a few hours. It took me like one and a half of a work day, still a long way for me to go :D.
body_html:
I did some very basic stuff in Blender before, in the older version - before 2.80, mostly just tutorials, in Blender 2.80 there was a lot of changes like UI overhaul, and I also forget almost every shortcut 😅 (shortcuts are heavily used in Blender and very unique, e.g. G to move things). Didn't touch Blender for over a year and half, then a month ago I came back, started slowly relearning what I forgot, did the Ruqqie, learned about compositor (thing for mostly effects like the shining crown), and in this project I learned a few new things (e.g. render layers for correcting colors of Ruqqie and environment independently, and ambient occlusion which looks great here, since there are no textures except a background image, it adds nice "shadow" gradients, visible for example on a bottom of trunks or top of bricks).

I think a pro could have done this project in a few hours. It took me like one and a half of a work day, still a long way for me to go :D.

I did some very basic stuff in Blender before, in the older version - before 2.80, mostly just tutorials, in Blender 2.80 there was a lot of changes like UI overhaul, and I also forget almost every shortcut 😅 (shortcuts are heavily used in Blender and very unique, e.g. G to move things). I think a pro could have done this project in a few hours. It took me like one and a half of a work day, still a long way for me to go :D.

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs
guild.description_html:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs
guild.name: Ruqqus
